attributes.action: Extend Notice for Marriages for postponed weddings due to Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: I have had to postpone my wedding due to Coronavirus and it’s not fair that I have to face another cost of another Notice of Marriage when all other aspects of my wedding has been moved free of charge. The government shouldn’t make another £70 profit out of my misery.
attributes.background: Extend Notice for Marriages for postponed weddings due to Coronavirus or cancel the payment due for new Notice of Marriages when one has expired but cannot be used due to Coronavirus.
